Description:
The Hostess has to check that any guest coming in is directly taken care of and welcomed as soon as arrived.
Guide guests to their tables and make sure to explain about the food concept and brand and answer any question with professionalism.
Make sure to introduce the guest to his/her supervisor for the night and move the communication for her from them. To offer a personalized service it is best to call a guest by his name and therefore a memorization of the guestâ€™s names is necessary.
Makes sure before the service, that the welcoming area is set and clean and that her table plan matches the sections.
Have to know the floor plan perfectly.
Hostesses are responsible for training and assisting new Hostesses. Ensure that personal grooming and uniform is to the required standards.
Promotes image of the brand by displaying impeccable manners, diplomacy and strategy towards our outlet, guests and the management.
Guest satisfaction is one of the main goals!
Informs the reservations manager in any case of maintenance problem or malfunction.
Responsible for filling table reports in the end of operation.
Attends briefings, training sessions and weekly meetings.
Deals with complaints or special requests and reports it to the management even if the problem is fixed.
Always keep a positive smile and professional classy body language at work, especially when dealing with guests.Skills
Skills:
Able to handle money accurately and operate a point-of-sale system.
Strong ability to maintain a positive, friendly attitude while delivering top-notch customer service in a fast-paced environment.
Excellent teamwork skills, with the ability to support and communicate effectively with all members of the restaurant staff.
Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to work effectively with diverse teams, even in high-stress situations.
